iti44:4.3: Saupādisesā ca nibbānadhātu, anupādisesā ca nibbānadhātu.
iti44:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṃ hoti khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto.
iti44:5.3: Tassa tiṭṭhanteva pañcindriyāni yesaṃ avighātattā manāpāmanāpaṃ paccanubhoti, sukhadukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti.
iti44:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṃ hoti khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto.
iti44:6.3: Tassa idheva, bhikkhave, sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sīti bhavissanti.
iti44:9.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
